column4: (Request) Can anybody explain to a ubuntu newbie how to install gaim 1.5.x on Edgy?
Keysir, that is not my experience. All of my usb 2.0 external drives work fine on my 1.0 pc
So you're agreeing with everyone? Everyone has told me that USB 2 devices will Indeed work on USB 1 computer.
yes. I have 2 generic HDs, 250 gb and 160 gb, and a 20gb 4th gen ipod. all work fine on my ubuntu machine
